experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Capgemini
workDescription: Participation in the development and maintenance of software dedicated to military aircraft.
Design and implementation of new functionalities in C# to improve software performance and reliability.
Create and manage complex SQL queries to guarantee data integrity and reliability.
Development of the user interface with WPF to improve the software's ergonomics and performance.

experiences.title: AR/VR Developer
experiences.subtitle: Conseil 3D
workDescription: Participation in the development of various mixed and augmented reality projects, from the creation of immersive applications to the optimization of tools for 3D artists.
Development of Virtual and Augmented Reality applications for Hololens 2 in Unity.
Development of real-time 3D applications in the form of serious games for PC and Android.
Development of tools for 3ds Max and Blender to optimize the workflow of 3D artists.
